name: Transformator
description:
For Brackeys Game Jam 2021.1

The city running low on production lmao some random boxes are your products, and your aim is to bring it back to track by building different factories.

Using limited resources AKA cells, build a fully functioning machine and produce enough products, but the machine also needs to function quick enough!

Make sure to check out my Discord server!

Absolutely useless but probably interesting info:

The game code and sprites in all their entirety are made by myself
The sounds are kindly brought to you by ZimonIsHim - my big rusky friend
The levels are partly made by the community - big thanks to (someone) for using their brains
My 6 yo sister wanted to play the game so much that she was constantly annoying me which was slowing my progress (I gave her but she didn't stop)
